1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Rachel, Chandler, Monica, and Joey are there as Phoebe enters.

lines.Line: Well it’s just—it’s one of those situations that I justNEWLINEhate. Y’know? A massage client gave me three tickets to the Helmet-Pelts exhibit atNEWLINEthe Morgan Chase museum

Great! Okay then it’s just us girls
Great! Okay then it’s just us girls

I mean think about all the money that you’re gonna make
Well, her father pays you for baby-sitting right

I mean Ross all that does is remind us that you are interested inNEWLINEfossils

lines.Character: (Paul reveals his presence by laughing, thus concluding standard sitcom joke 2B. PaulNEWLINEthen pulls Ross aside to have a little chat with him and tells the rest of the group thatNEWLINEhe’ll just be one second
lines.Line: Paul reveals his presence by laughing, thus concluding standard sitcom joke 2B. PaulNEWLINEthen pulls Ross aside to have a little chat with him and tells the rest of the group thatNEWLINEhe’ll just be one second.
Okay look, Ross, just so you know that since Lizzie likes you so much,NEWLINEI’ve decided to accept the fact that you’re going out with her

Ohh! A man with a plan

2.SceneDescription: The Morgan Chase Museum, the girls are entering.

lines.Line: Where do you want to start

lines.Character: (A museum official enters with another man and woman
lines.Line: A museum official enters with another man and woman.

lines.Line: A museum official enters with another man and woman.
(to the couple) You can put the aisle over here (points),NEWLINEand put the wedding ceremony right over here. (Points.
I didn’t know you could get married here
I didn’t know you could get married here

This would be a beautiful place to get married, yeah, but INEWLINEwouldn’t put the aisle there and I would never have the ceremony there!NEWLINE(Points to both places.) I mean you’d have the ceremony under this big beautifulNEWLINEarch. (The arch at the entrance to the room.)
Oh sorry didn’t mean to interrupt. It’s just such a beautifulNEWLINEspace; do you do a lot of weddings here
Yes. We’re very popular. There’s a two-yearNEWLINEwaiting list. Sorry! (She kinda storms out with the couple.
Monica, you should totally put your name down on the lis

Yeah, but there’s a two-year wait. And then what if you get engagedNEWLINEin two years and then you got to wait another two years for this place. That’sNEWLINEfour years. Chandler’s not gonna wait that long. He’s gonna find somebody else,NEWLINEy’know? Someone, someone who did put their name on the list. (Rachel agrees.
Yeah hon, it can’t hurt to put your name down! I mean in if twoNEWLINEyears if you’re not engaged you just don’t use it

Well, I mean I guess there is no harm in putting my name down
Well, I mean I guess there is no harm in putting my name down

lines.Line: Yeah, I’ve been coming here since I was a kid. This used to beNEWLINEmy Grandma’s

lines.Line: I know. I like it up here
I know. I like it up here

I feel like we’re the only two people in the world. (She sets downNEWLINEher wine class, picks up a walnut, and knocks another one on the floor.) Oops. Sorry. (SheNEWLINEreaches down to pick it up and Ross hands it to her. Ross is hiding under the couch andNEWLINEcauses Rachel to scream.

(under the couch) You and your ice

lines.Line: Uh yeah, where-where’s the guy who decides who’s pictures go upNEWLINEon the wall

Oh, you’re kidding me! All-all right, well make sure you tell himNEWLINEthat Joey Tribbiani stopped by to drop off all of these clothes. Okay? I’m an actor;NEWLINEI’m kinda getting my picture up there on the wall

lines.Line: The woman from the museum called and said that there was a cancellationNEWLINEand that we could move up our wedding and Chandler heard! (Phoebe gasps.) I know! How badNEWLINEis this?
